c1.name: Flower of Eden
c1.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

c2.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
c2.effect:
Transient Blossoms generated by **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
·Unleashing **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

c3.name: Grace of Helios
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Descent of Divinity
c4.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

c5.name: Tide of Hadean
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dust of Purification
c6.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

c1.name: Intuition
c1.effect: When a Projection Attack hits an opponent, **Universality: An Elaboration on Form**'s CD is decreased by 1.2s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

c2.name: Debate
c2.effect: When Alhaitham generates a Chisel-Light Mirror, his Elemental Mastery will be increased by 50 for 8 seconds, max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered even when the maximum number of Chisel-Light Mirrors has been reached.

c3.name: Negation
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Universality: An Elaboration on Form** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Elucidation
c4.effect:
When **Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena** is unleashed, the following effects will become active based on the number of Chisel-Light Mirrors consumed and created this time around:
·Each Mirror consumed will increase the Elemental Mastery of all other nearby party members by 30 for 15s.
·Each Mirror generated will grant Alhaitham a 10% Dendro DMG Bonus for 15s.

The pre-existing duration of the aforementioned effects will be cleared if you use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena again while they are in effect.

c5.name: Sagacity
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Structuration
c6.effect:
Alhaitham gains the following effects:
· 2 seconds after **Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena** is unleashed, he will generate 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors regardless of the number of mirrors consumed.
· If Alhaitham generates Chisel-Light Mirrors when their numbers have already maxed out, his CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 10% and 70% respectively for 6s. If this effect is triggered again during its initial duration, the duration remaining will be increased by 6s.

c1.name: Star of Another World
c1.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c2.name: Star of Another World
c2.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c3.name: Star of Another World
c3.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c4.name: Star of Another World
c4.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c5.name: Star of Another World
c5.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c6.name: Star of Another World
c6.effect: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

c1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
c1.effect: Fires 2 arrows per **Aimed Shot**. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

c2.name: Bunny Triggered
c2.effect:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

c3.name: It Burns!
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fiery Rain** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
c4.effect: Decreases **Explosive Puppet**'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

c5.name: It's Baron Bunny!
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Explosive Puppet** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wildfire
c6.effect: **Fiery Rain** increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

c1.name: Stay a While and Listen Up
c1.effect: After using **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!**, Arataki Itto gains 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength. After 1s, Itto will gain 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength every 0.5s for 1.5s.

c2.name: Gather 'Round, It's a Brawl!
c2.effect:
After using **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!**, each party member whose Element is Geo will decrease that skill's CD by 1.5s and restore 6 Energy to Arataki Itto.
CD can be decreased by up to 4.5s in this manner. Max 18 Energy can be restored in this manner.

c3.name: Horns Lowered, Coming Through
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Jailhouse Bread and Butter
c4.effect: When the Raging Oni King state caused by **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!** ends, all nearby party members gain 20% DEF and 20% ATK for 10s.

c5.name: 10 Years of Hanamizaka Fame
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Arataki Itto, Present!
c6.effect: Arataki Itto's Charged Attacks deal +70% Crit DMG. Additionally, when he uses Arataki Kesagiri, he has a 50% chance to not consume stacks of Superlative Superstrength.

c1.name: Attentive Observation
c1.effect: **Universal Diagnosis** gains 1 additional charge.

c2.name: Incisive Discernment
c2.effect:
When your own active character hits a nearby opponent with their attacks, Baizhu will unleash a Gossamer Sprite: Splice.
Gossamer Sprite: Splice will initiate 1 attack before returning, dealing 250% of Baizhu's ATK as Dendro DMG and healing for 20% of **Universal Diagnosis**'s Gossamer Sprite's normal healing.
DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

c3.name: All Aspects Stabilized
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Holistic Revivification** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Ancient Art of Perception
c4.effect: For 15s after **Holistic Revivification** is used, Baizhu will increase all nearby party members' Elemental Mastery by 80.

c5.name: The Hidden Ebb and Flow
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Universal Diagnosis** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Elimination of Malicious Qi
c6.effect:
Increases the DMG dealt by **Holistic Revivification**'s Spiritveins by 8% of Baizhu's Max HP.
Additionally, when a **Gossamer Sprite** or Gossamer Sprite: Splice hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of generating one of **Holistic Revivification**'s Seamless Shields. This effect can only be triggered once by each Gossamer Sprite or Gossamer Sprite: Splice.

c1.name: Gleeful Songs
c1.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

c2.name: Vitality Burst
c2.effect:
Decreases the CD of **Let the Show Begin♪** by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

c3.name: Star of Tomorrow
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Shining Miracle♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attentiveness Be My Power
c4.effect:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

c5.name: The Purest Companionship
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Let the Show Begin♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dedicating Everything to You
c6.effect:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
c1.effect:
When **Stormbreaker** is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

c2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
c2.effect: **Stormbreaker**'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

c3.name: Summoner of Storm
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Tidecaller** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Stunning Revenge
c4.effect: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.

c5.name: Crimson Tidewalker
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stormbreaker** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Bane of Evil
c6.effect: During the duration of **Stormbreaker**, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

c1.name: Grand Expectation
c1.effect: **Fantastic Voyage**'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

c2.name: Impasse Conqueror
c2.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

c3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Passion Overload** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
c4.effect:
Using a Normal Attack as the second attack of **Passion Overload**'s Charge Level 1 will perform a follow-up attack.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

c5.name: True Explorer
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fantastic Voyage** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Fire Ventures With Me
c6.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside **Fantastic Voyage**'s radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

c1.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
c1.effect: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by **Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide** is increased by 3s.

c2.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
c2.effect: When **Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum** hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.

c3.name: Hunter's Supplication
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sentinel Oath
c4.effect: Shortens the Hold CD of **Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum** to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.

c5.name: Heterochromatic Gaze
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Overflow
c6.effect:
When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by **Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide** deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals AoE Hydro DMG equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP.
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

c1.name: Ice Unleashed
c1.effect: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

c2.name: Atmospheric Revolution
c2.effect: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by **Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost** have their CD time decreased by 15%.

c3.name: Cloudburst
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Skies
c4.effect:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

c5.name: The True Path
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rally of Four Blades
c6.effect:
**Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star** deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

c1.name: Deepwood Patrol
c1.effect: When in the party and not on the field, Collei's Energy Recharge is increased by 20%.

c2.name: Through Hill and Copse
c2.effect:
The Passive Talent Floral Sidewinder is changed to this:
The **Floral Ring** will grant the character the Sprout effect from Floral Sidewinder upon return, dealing 40% of Collei's ATK as Dendro DMG to nearby opponents for 3s.
From the moment of using **Floral Brush** to the moment when this instance of Sprout effect ends, if any of your party members triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Sprout effect will be extended by 3s.
The Sprout effect can only be extended this way once. If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed. DMG dealt by Sprout is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Requires you to have unlocked the Floral Sidewinder Passive Talent.

c3.name: Scent of Summer
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Floral Brush** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Gift of the Woods
c4.effect: Using **Trump-Card Kitty** will increase all nearby characters' Elemental Mastery by 60 for 12s (not including Collei herself).

c5.name: All Embers
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Trump-Card Kitty** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Forest of Falling Arrows
c6.effect:
When the **Floral Ring** hits, it will create a miniature Cuilein-Anbar that will deal 200% of Collei's ATK as Dendro DMG.
Each **Floral Brush** can only create one such miniature Cuilein-Anbar.

c1.name: Ordinance: Unceasing Vigil
c1.effect:
After using **Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness**, Cyno's Normal Attack SPD will be increased by 20% for 10s. If the Judication effect of his Passive Talent Featherfall Judgment is triggered during **Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer**, the duration of this increase will be refreshed.
You need to unlock the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgment."

c2.name: Ceremony: Homecoming of Spirits
c2.effect: When Cyno's Normal Attacks hit opponents, his Electro DMG Bonus will increase by 10% for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 5 stacks.

c3.name: Precept: Lawful Enforcer
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Austerity: Forbidding Guard
c4.effect:
When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state triggered by **Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness**, after he triggers Electro-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or an Electro Swirl reaction, he will restore 3 Elemental Energy for all nearby party members (except himself.)
This effect can occur 5 times within one use of **Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness**.

c5.name: Funerary Rite: The Passing of Starlight
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Raiment: Just Scales
c6.effect:
After using **Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness** or triggering the Judication effect of the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgment," Cyno will gain 4 stacks of the "Day of the Jackal" effect. When he hits opponents with Normal Attacks, he will consume 1 stack of "Day of the Jackal" to fire off one Duststalker Bolt.
"Day of the Jackal" lasts for 8s. Max 8 stacks. It will be canceled once Pactsworn Pathclearer ends.
A maximum of 1 Duststalker Bolt can be unleashed this way every 0.4s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgment."

c1.name: The Flame Incandescent
c1.effect:
Dehya's Max HP is increased by 20%, and she deals bonus DMG based on her Max HP when using the following attacks:
·**Molten Inferno**'s DMG will be increased by 3.6% of her Max HP.
·**Leonine Bite**'s DMG will be increased by 6% of her Max HP.

c2.name: The Sand-Blades Glittering
c2.effect:
When Dehya uses **Molten Inferno: Ranging Flame**, the duration of the recreated Fiery Sanctum field will be increased by 6s.
Additionally, when a Fiery Sanctum exists on the field, DMG dealt by its next coordinated attack will be increased by 50% when active character(s) within the Fiery Sanctum field are attacked.

c3.name: A Rage Swift as Fire
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Leonine Bite** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: An Oath Abiding
c4.effect: When Flame-Mane's Fist and Incineration Drive attacks unleashed during **Leonine Bite** hit opponents, they will restore 1.5 Energy for Dehya and 2.5% of her Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.

c5.name: The Alpha Unleashed
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Molten Inferno** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Burning Claws Cleaving
c6.effect:
The CRIT Rate of **Leonine Bite** is increased by 10%.
Additionally, after a Flame-Mane's Fist attack hits an opponent and deals CRIT Hits during a single Blazing Lioness state, it will cause the CRIT DMG of Leonine Bite to increase by 15% for the rest of Blazing Lioness's duration and extend that duration by 0.5s. This effect can be triggered every 0.2s. The duration can be extended for a maximum of 2s and CRIT DMG can be increased by a maximum of 60% this way.

c1.name: Conviction
c1.effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

c2.name: Searing Ember
c2.effect:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

c3.name: Fire and Steel
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Searing Onslaught** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Flowing Flame
c4.effect:
Casting **Searing Onslaught** in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting **Searing Onslaught**, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

c5.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dawn** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
c6.effect:
After casting **Searing Onslaught**, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

c1.name: A Lingering Flavor
c1.effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of **Signature Mix** end.

c2.name: Shaken, Not Purred
c2.effect:
Increases **Icy Paws**' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the **Icy Paws** shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

c3.name: A—Another Round?
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Signature Mix** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wine Industry Slayer
c4.effect: Within the radius of **Signature Mix**, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

c5.name: Double Shot, on the Rocks
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Icy Paws** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
c6.effect:
Characters within **Signature Mix**'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
·Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
·Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

c1.name: Additional Investment
c1.effect: The number of After-Sales Service Rounds created by **Troubleshooter Shots** is increased by 1.

c2.name: Special Franchise
c2.effect: When you are in combat and the **Jinni** heals the character it is connected to, it will fire a Jinni Toop from that character's position that deals 50% of Dori's ATK DMG.

c3.name: Wonders Never Cease
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Alcazarzaray's Exactitude** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Discretionary Supplement
c4.effect:
The character connected to the **Jinni** will obtain the following buffs based on their current HP and Energy:
·When their HP is lower than 50%, they gain 50% Incoming Healing Bonus.
·When their Energy is less than 50%, they gain 30% Energy Recharge.

c5.name: Value for Mora
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sprinkling Weight
c6.effect:
Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using **Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon**:
·Electro Infusion.
·When Normal Attacks hit opponents, all nearby party members will heal HP equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.

c1.name: Tidal Illusion
c1.effect:
Every time **Icetide Vortex**'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

c2.name: Lady of Seafoam
c2.effect: Decreases the CD of **Icetide Vortex**'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Press CD.

c3.name: Lawrence Pedigree
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Glacial Illumination** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
c4.effect: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

c5.name: Chivalric Quality
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Icetide Vortex** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Noble Obligation
c6.effect: Lightfall Swords created by **Glacial Illumination** start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

c1.name: Truth by Any Means
c1.effect: Faruzan can fire off a maximum of 2 Hurricane Arrows using fully charged Aimed Shots while under the effect of a single Manifest Gale created by **Wind Realm of Nasamjnin**.

c2.name: Overzealous Intellect
c2.effect: The duration of the Dazzling Polyhedron created by **The Wind's Secret Ways** is increased by 6s.

c3.name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Wind Realm of Nasamjnin** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Divine Comprehension
c4.effect:
The vortex created by **Pressurized Collapses** will restore Energy to Faruzan based on the number of opponents hit: If it hits 1 opponent, it will restore 2 Energy for Faruzan. Each additional opponent hit will restore 0.5 more Energy for Faruzan.
A maximum of 4 Energy can be restored to her per vortex.

c5.name: Wonderland of Rumination
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **The Wind's Secret Ways** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
c6.effect: Characters affected by **The Wind's Secret Ways**' Prayerful Wind's Benefit have 40% increased CRIT DMG when they deal Anemo DMG. When the active character deals DMG while affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit, they will apply Pressurized Collapse to the opponent damaged. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. This CD is shared between all party members.

c1.name: Gaze of the Deep
c1.effect: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a coordinated attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

c2.name: Devourer of All Sins
c2.effect: When **Nightrider** is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

c3.name: Wings of Nightmare
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Nightrider** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
c4.effect:
When **Midnight Phantasmagoria** is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

c5.name: Against the Fleeing Light
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Midnight Phantasmagoria** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Evernight Raven
c6.effect: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs coordinated attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

c1.name: Dew-Drinker
c1.effect:
Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrows or Frostflake Arrow Blooms decrease opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s upon hit.
A hit also regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hits the target.

c2.name: The Auspicious
c2.effect: **Trail of the Qilin** gains 1 additional charge.

c3.name: Cloud-Strider
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Celestial Shower** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Westward Sojourn
c4.effect:
Opponents standing within the AoE of **Celestial Shower** take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

c5.name: The Merciful
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Trail of the Qilin** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Clement
c6.effect: Using **Trail of the Qilin** causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

c1.name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
c1.effect:
When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's **General's War Banner** or **General's Glory** deal Geo DMG to opponents, the CD of Gorou's **Inuzaka All-Round Defense** is decreased by 2s.
This effect can occur once every 10s.

c2.name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
c2.effect:
While **General's Glory** is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. 
This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

c3.name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Inuzaka All-Round Defense** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
c4.effect: When **General's Glory** is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

c5.name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Juuga: Forward Unto Victory** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
c6.effect:
For 12s after using **Inuzaka All-Round Defense** or **Juuga: Forward Unto Victory**, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' Geo DMG based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
· "Standing Firm": +10%
· "Impregnable": +20%
· "Crunch": +40%

This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.

c1.name: Crimson Bouquet
c1.effect: While in a **Paramita Papilio** state activated by **Guide to Afterlife**, Hu Tao's Charged Attacks do not consume Stamina.

c2.name: Ominous Rainfall
c2.effect:
Increases the **Blood Blossom** DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, **Spirit Soother** will also apply the **Blood Blossom** effect.

c3.name: Lingering Carmine
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Guide to Afterlife** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
c4.effect: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a **Blood Blossom** that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

c5.name: Floral Incense
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit Soother** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Butterfly's Embrace
c6.effect:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, her All Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c1.name: Spiraling Tempest
c1.effect: Increases the pulling speed of **Gale Blade** after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

c2.name: People's Aegis
c2.effect: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

c3.name: When the West Wind Arises
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dandelion Breeze** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lands of Dandelion
c4.effect: Within the Field created by **Dandelion Breeze**, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

c5.name: Outbursting Gust
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Gale Blade** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
c6.effect: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by **Dandelion Breeze**. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

c1.name: Scarlet Hills
c1.effect:
Decreases **Chihayaburu**'s CD by 10%.
Using **Kazuha Slash** resets the CD of **Chihayaburu**.

c2.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
c2.effect:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by **Kazuha Slash** has the following effects:
· Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200 for its duration.
· Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

c3.name: Maple Monogatari
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Chihayaburu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Oozora Genpou
c4.effect:
When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
·Pressing or Holding **Chihayaburu** regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
·When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

c5.name: Wisdom of Bansei
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kazuha Slash** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Crimson Momiji
c6.effect: After using **Chihayaburu** or **Kazuha Slash**, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks by 0.2%.

c1.name: Excellent Blood
c1.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Never-Ending Performance
c2.effect: While **Glacial Waltz** is in effect, for each opponent defeated, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

c3.name: Dance of Frost
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Frostgnaw** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Kiss
c4.effect:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

c5.name: Frostbiting Embrace
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Glacial Waltz** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Glacial Whirlwind
c6.effect: **Glacial Waltz** will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

c1.name: Snowswept Sakura
c1.effect: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of **Kamisato Art: Hyouka** by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

c2.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
c2.effect: When casting **Kamisato Art: Soumetsu**, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

c3.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Soumetsu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Ebb and Flow
c4.effect: Opponents damaged by **Kamisato Art: Soumetsu**'s Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

c5.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Hyouka** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dance of Suigetsu
c6.effect: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

c1.name: Kyouka Fuushi
c1.effect: **Shunsuiken** DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

c2.name: World Source
c2.effect: **Namisen**'s maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

c3.name: To Admire the Flowers
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Kyouka** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Endless Flow
c4.effect: After using **Kamisato Art: Suiyuu**, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

c5.name: Bansui Ichiro
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kamisato Art: Suiyuu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Boundless Origin
c6.effect:
After using **Kamisato Art: Kyouka**, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.

c1.name: Sublime Salutations
c1.effect: Within 3s after using **Artistic Ingenuity**, Kaveh's Dendro RES and Incoming Healing Bonus will be increased by 50% and 25% respectively.

c2.name: Grace of Royal Roads
c2.effect: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during **Painted Dome**.

c3.name: Profferings of Dur Untash
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Painted Dome** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Feast of Apadana
c4.effect: Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.

c5.name: Treasures of Bonkhanak
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Artistic Ingenuity** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Pairidaeza's Dreams
c6.effect: When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents during **Painted Dome**, they will unleash Pairidaeza's Light upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as AoE Dendro DMG and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to burst. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

c1.name: Thundering Might
c1.effect: Recasting **Stellar Restoration** while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

c2.name: Keen Extraction
c2.effect:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c3.name: Foreseen Reformation
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Starward Sword** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attunement
c4.effect: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

c5.name: Beckoning Stars
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stellar Restoration** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Tenacious Star
c6.effect:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

c1.name: Material Circulation
c1.effect: Every 8,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will cause her to create 1 extra **Cat Grass Cardamom** when she uses **Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch**. A maximum of 4 extra can be created this way.

c2.name: Perfectly Packaged
c2.effect:
When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of **Meow-teor Kick**, she will grant other party members she crashes into Critical Transport Shields.
The DMG absorption of Critical Transport Shield is 40% of the maximum absorption **Meow-teor Kick**'s normal Shields of Safe Transport are capable of, and will absorb Dendro DMG with 250% effectiveness.
Critical Transport Shields last 12s and can be triggered once on each character every 10s.

c3.name: Universal Recognition
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Meow-teor Kick** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Steed of Skanda
c4.effect: After active character(s) protected by **Shields of Safe Transport** or **Critical Transport Shields** hit opponents with Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, Kirara will perform a coordinated attack with them using **Small Cat Grass Cardamoms**, dealing 200% of her ATK as Dendro DMG. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 3.8s. This CD is shared between all party members.

c5.name: A Thousand Miles in a Day
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Countless Sights to See
c6.effect: All nearby party members will gain 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus within 15s after Kirara uses her Elemental Skill or Burst.

c1.name: Chained Reactions
c1.effect: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of **Sparks 'n' Splash**'s DMG.

c2.name: Explosive Frags
c2.effect: Being hit by **Jumpy Dumpty**'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c3.name: Exquisite Compound
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Jumpy Dumpty** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sparkly Explosion
c4.effect: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of **Sparks 'n' Splash**, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c5.name: Nova Burst
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sparks 'n' Splash** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Blazing Delight
c6.effect:
While under the effects of **Sparks 'n' Splash**, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When **Sparks 'n' Splash** is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

c1.name: Crow's Eye
c1.effect:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of **Tengu Stormcall** is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

c2.name: Dark Wings
c2.effect: Unleashing **Tengu Stormcall** will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

c3.name: The War Within
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Subjugation: Koukou Sendou** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Conclusive Proof
c4.effect: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by **Subjugation: Koukou Sendou** is increased to 6.

c5.name: Spellsinger
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Tengu Stormcall** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sin of Pride
c6.effect: The Electro DMG of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.

c1.name: To Cloister Compassion
c1.effect: **Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite**'s AoE is increased by 50%.

c2.name: To Forsake Fortune
c2.effect: **Grass Ring of Sanctification**'s duration is increased by 3s.

c3.name: To Sequester Sorrow
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sanctifying Ring** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: To Sever Sealing
c4.effect:
When the Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks of the character affected by Shinobu's **Grass Ring of Sanctification** hit opponents, a Thundergrass Mark will land on the opponent's position and deal AoE Electro DMG based on 9.7% of Shinobu's Max HP.
This effect can occur once every 5s.

c5.name: To Cease Courtesies
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: To Ward Weakness
c6.effect:
When Kuki Shinobu takes lethal DMG, this instance of DMG will not take her down. This effect will automatically trigger when her HP reaches 1 and will trigger once every 60s.
When Shinobu's HP drops below 25%, she will gain 150 Elemental Mastery for 15s. This effect will trigger once every 60s.

c1.name: Fortress of Fantasy
c1.effect:
The Shield Absorption of the Curtain of Slumber generated by **Nights of Formal Focus** is increased by 20%.
Additionally, when unleashing Nights of Formal Focus, she will generate a shield for any nearby party members who are not being protected by a Curtain of Slumber. This shield will have 35% of the absorption of a Curtain of Slumber, will last for 12s, and will absorb Cryo DMG with 250% effectiveness.

c2.name: Light's Remit
c2.effect: When Shooting Stars from **Nights of Formal Focus** strike opponents, they will each restore 1 Energy to Layla. Each Shooting Star can restore Energy to her in this manner once.

c3.name: Secrets of the Night
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Nights of Formal Focus** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Starry Illumination
c4.effect:
When **Nights of Formal Focus** starts to fire off Shooting Stars, it will grant all nearby party members the Dawn Star effect, causing their Normal and Charged Attack DMG to increase based on 5% of Layla's Max HP.
Dawn Star can last up to 3s and will be removed 0.05s after dealing Normal or Charged Attack DMG.

c5.name: Stream of Consciousness
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Radiant Soulfire
c6.effect:
Shooting Stars from **Nights of Formal Focus** deal 40% increased DMG, and Starlight Slugs from **Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker** deal 40% increased DMG.
Additionally, the interval between the creation of Night Stars via Nights of Formal Focus is decreased by 20%.

c1.name: Infinite Circuit
c1.effect:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding **Violet Arc**.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c2.name: Electromagnetic Field
c2.effect:
Holding **Violet Arc** has the following effects:
·Increases DEF by 25%.
·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

c3.name: Resonant Thunder
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lightning Rose** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Plasma Eruption
c4.effect: **Lightning Rose** now unleashes 1-3 lightning bolts when it attacks.

c5.name: Electrocute
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Violet Arc** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Pulsating Witch
c6.effect:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of **Violet Arc**'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c1.name: Factor Confluence
c1.effect: The Soulwind state of **Starfrost Swirl** can decrease the healing interval between instances caused by **Skyfeather Song**'s Eagleplume state. This decrease percentage is equal to the ATK SPD increase provided by Soulwind.

c2.name: Companion's Ingress
c2.effect:
When **Starfrost Swirl**'s Flowfrost Arrow first hits an opponent, or its Rimestar Flare hits an opponent, 1 Detector stack from Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" will be generated.
You must have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.

c3.name: Reconnaissance Experience
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Skyfeather Song** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sunfrost Encomium
c4.effect: When Mika's own **Skyfeather Song**'s Eagleplume state heals party members, this will restore 3 Energy to Mika. This form of Energy restoration can occur 5 times during the Eagleplume state created by 1 use of Skyfeather Song.

c5.name: Signal Arrow
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Starfrost Swirl** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Companion's Counsel
c6.effect:
The maximum number of Detector stacks that **Starfrost Swirl**'s Soulwind can gain is increased by 1. You need to have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.
Additionally, active characters affected by Soulwind will deal 60% more Physical CRIT DMG.

c1.name: Prophecy of Submersion
c1.effect:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s:
·Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
·Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
·Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
·Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

c2.name: Lunar Chain
c2.effect:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c3.name: Restless Revolution
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stellaris Phantasm** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
c4.effect: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

c5.name: Mockery of Fortuna
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Mirror Reflection of Doom** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
c6.effect:
Upon entering **Illusory Torrent**, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

c1.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
c1.effect: When the **Shrine of Maya** is unleashed and the Elemental Types of the party members are being tabulated, the count will add 1 to the number of Pyro, Electro, and Hydro characters respectively.

c2.name: The Root of All Fullness
c2.effect:
Opponents that are marked by **Seeds of Skandha** applied by Nahida herself will be affected by the following effects:
·Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon Reaction DMG they receive can score CRIT Hits. CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are fixed at 20% and 100% respectively.
·Within 8s of being affected by Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, DEF is decreased by 30%.

c3.name: The Shoot of Conscious Attainment
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **All Schemes to Know** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Stem of Manifest Inference
c4.effect: When 1/2/3/4 (or more) nearby opponents are affected by **All Schemes to Know**'s Seeds of Skandha, Nahida's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100/120/140/160.

c5.name: The Leaves of Enlightening Speech
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Illusory Heart** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Fruit of Reason's Culmination
c6.effect:
When Nahida hits an opponent affected by **All Schemes to Know**'s Seeds of Skandha with Normal or Charged Attacks after unleashing **Illusory Heart**, she will use Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion on this opponent and all connected opponents, dealing Dendro DMG based on 200% of Nahida's ATK and 400% of her Elemental Mastery.
DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is considered Elemental Skill DMG and can be triggered once every 0.2s.
This effect can last up to 10s and will be removed after Nahida has unleashed 6 instances of Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion.

c1.name: Dance of the Waning Moon
c1.effect:
**Dance of Haftkarsvar** will be enhanced as follows:
·Luminous Illusion DMG is increased by 65%.
·The Tranquility Aura's duration is extended by 6s.

c2.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
c2.effect:
After characters affected by the Golden Chalice's Bounty deal Hydro DMG to an opponent, that opponent's Hydro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s. After a triggered Bloom reaction deals DMG to opponents, their Dendro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s.
You need to have unlocked the "Court of Dancing Petals" Talent.

c3.name: Beguiling Shadowstep
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Fricative Pulse
c4.effect: After the third dance step of **Dance of Haftkarsvar**'s Pirouette hits opponents, Nilou will gain 15 Elemental Energy, and DMG from her **Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring** will be increased by 50% for 8s.

c5.name: Twirling Light
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dance of Haftkarsvar** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Frostbreaker's Melody
c6.effect:
For every 1,000 points of Max HP, Nilou's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 0.6% and 1.2% respectively.
The maximum increase in CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG via this method is 30% and 60% respectively.

c1.name: Piercing Fragments
c1.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

c2.name: Shock Effect
c2.effect:
When **Jade Screen** is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

c3.name: Majesty Be the Array of Stars
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Starshatter** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
c4.effect: **Jade Screen** increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

c5.name: Invincible Be the Jade Screen
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Jade Screen** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Grandeur Be the Seven Stars
c6.effect: When **Starshatter** is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

c1.name: I Got Your Back
c1.effect: While **Sweeping Time** and **Breastplate** are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

c2.name: Combat Maid
c2.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

c3.name: Invulnerable Maid
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Breastplate** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: To Be Cleaned
c4.effect: When **Breastplate**'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% of Noelle's ATK as Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.

c5.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sweeping Time** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Must Be Spotless
c6.effect:
**Sweeping Time** increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

c1.name: Ascetics of Frost
c1.effect: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

c2.name: Frozen to the Bone
c2.effect: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c3.name: Ascendant Praise
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Divine Suppression
c4.effect: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

c5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rite of Resurrection
c6.effect:
Using **Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune** revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Ominous Inscription
c1.effect: **Chakra Desiderata** will gather Resolve even faster. When Electro characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

c2.name: Steelbreaker
c2.effect: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu**, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents' DEF.

c3.name: Shinkage Bygones
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Pledge of Propriety
c4.effect: When the **Musou Isshin** state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu** expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

c5.name: Shogun's Descent
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Transcendence: Baleful Omen** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wishbearer
c6.effect:
While in the **Musou Isshin** state applied by **Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu**, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.

c4.name: Bait-and-Switch
c4.effect: Increases all party members' Max HP by 10% for 25s for every opponent marked by **Lifeline** when the Lifeline explodes. A maximum increase of 40% Max HP can be attained in this manner.

c5.name: Dealer's Sleight
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Lingering Lifeline** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Winner Takes All
c6.effect:
After using **Depth-Clarion Dice**, Yelan will enter the Mastermind state.
In this state, all of Yelan's Normal Attacks will be special Breakthrough Barbs. These Breakthrough Barbs will have similar abilities to normal ones and the DMG dealt will be considered Charged Attack DMG, dealing 156% of a normal Breakthrough Barb's DMG.

The Mastermind state lasts 20s and will be cleared after Yelan fires 5 arrows.

c1.name: Agate Ryuukin
c1.effect:
The Aurous Blaze created by **Ryuukin Saxifrage** lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

c2.name: A Procession of Bonfires
c2.effect:
When Yoimiya's Pyro DMG scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% Pyro DMG Bonus for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

c3.name: Trickster's Flare
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Niwabi Fire-Dance** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Pyrotechnic Professional
c4.effect: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, **Niwabi Fire-Dance**'s CD is decreased by 1.2s.

c5.name: A Summer Festival's Eve
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Ryuukin Saxifrage** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
c6.effect: During **Niwabi Fire-Dance**, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Blazing Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.

c1.name: Thespian Gallop
c1.effect: **Opening Flourish's** CD is decreased by 18%.

c2.name: Myriad Mise-En-Scène
c2.effect: After **Cliffbreaker's Banner** is unleashed, all nearby party members' Normal Attack DMG is increased by 15% for 12s.

c3.name: Seafaring General
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Cliffbreaker's Banner** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Flower and a Fighter
c4.effect: When Yun Jin triggers the Crystallize Reaction, her DEF is increased by 20% for 12s.

c5.name: Famed Throughout the Land
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Opening Flourish** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Decorous Harmony
c6.effect: Characters under the effects of the **Flying Cloud Flag Formation** have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 12%.

c1.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
c1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by **Dominus Lapidis** that may exist simultaneously to 2.

c2.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
c2.effect: **Planet Befall** grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

c3.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dominus Lapidis** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
c4.effect: Increases **Planet Befall**'s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

c5.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Planet Befall** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
c6.effect:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.
